content: उद्देश्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be illustrated or explained. {@--2@} To be intended or aimed at. {@--3@} That to which one refers or which one has in view. --श्यं {@--1@} The object in view, an incentive. {@--2@} The subject of an assertion (<ab>opp.</ab> विधेय); see the word अनुवाद्य also.
